ValidationRule.description: Prevents edits to Status Indicator records that are Submitted for Approval and Locked
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISCHANGED( PgM_Accomplishments__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Budget__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Budget_Path_to_Green__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Budget_Reason__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Leadership_Asks__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Plans_for_Next_Week__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Report_Status__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Resources__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Resources_Path_to_Green__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Resources_Reason__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Schedule__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Schedule_Path_to_Green__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Schedule_Reason__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Scope__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Scope_Path_to_Green__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Scope_Reason__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Executive_Status__c ) || ISCHANGED( Name ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Summary__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Trending__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Week_Ending__c ) || ISCHANGED( PgM_Workstream__c )) && PgM_Record_Locked__c = true && PgM_Current_Approver__c = false && ISPICKVAL( PgM_Report_Status__c , 'Pending Approval')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Status Indicator has been submitted for approval and the record is locked.
